body_html:
Basically, I have tried to build it from source, but it didn't help.
Then I decided to manually update the mkl package with conda update. However this broke the dependencies of many packages on mkl and omp.
Then I removed completely my anaconda installation and did a fresh install, which already included a new version of mkl.
Finally I installed pytorch with conda install and everything worked greatly.
body_text:
Basically, I have tried to build it from source, but it didn't help.
Then I decided to manually update the mkl package with conda update. However this broke the dependencies of many packages on mkl and omp.
Then I removed completely my anaconda installation and did a fresh install, which already included a new version of mkl.
Finally I installed pytorch with conda install and everything worked greatly.
body:
Basically, I have tried to build it from source, but it didn't help. 
Then I decided to manually update the mkl package with `conda update`. However this broke the dependencies of many packages on `mkl` and `omp`.
Then I removed completely my anaconda installation and did a fresh install, which already included a new version of `mkl`. 
Finally I installed pytorch with `conda install` and everything worked greatly.
